name: Narcotics Anonymous Meetings
description: SFNA has supportive in-person and virtual meetings in San Francisco for adults who are recovering from drug addiction. - To attend a meeting, see the meeting schedule posted online. - NOTE: Some meetings are for women only and some are for men only. See the meeting schedule for details.

agency: San Francisco Area of Narcotics Anonymous
